About me

Hi ! My name is ElvireDev. I am a Web Developer.

I build new projects just to tickle my brain and I love learning new concepts to improve myself.

I am currently working as a tech lead in a French company but I am still looking to improve my skills in pure development.

What i do

Responsive site creation for a successful user experience.

web Design

Creation of aesthetic content adapted to your business. Design at the service of ergonomics, to facilitate the use of your site

Production support and technical support for web development and web design.
